reviewText: I have around 15 yoga DVDs and this one is in my top 2. If you like a challenging practice with Vinyasa and Bikram elements, try this one! If you already have a practice, I think you'll find Todd's guidance is good enough to use only the audio. My only qualm is they move through the Chaturangas quicker than I would like. Oh yeah and keep an eye out for the dog that makes an appearance!
